p:
The MBC is the lowest broth dilution of antibacterial ‎‎compound preventing the growth of the organism on the medium. It has been recognized that some EOs have antibacterial ‎‎activities.
30
-
32 This study showed that application of EOs was effective in inhibiting S. putrefaciens, P. fluorescens, L. monocytogenes; and E. coli O157:H7 ( Table 3). The best antibacterial ‎‎activity was exhibited by ZEO and OEO against E. coli O157:H7 and S. putrefaciens. There were no differences between the MBC of ZEO and OEO.
